First English Translation: I want to go, I want to do what God tells me to do and then
Final Refined Translation: I want to go, I want to do what God is telling me to do, and then

Source: Die Fhrer der Kirche sind ehrlich davon berzeugt, dass Sie das Reich Gottes aufbauen knnen wie keine Generation vor Ihnen, sagte er. Wir wissen, dass die Kirche und das Reich Gottes nur weiter aufgerichtet werden und wachsen knnen, wenn Ihre Generation erfolgreich ist.
First English Translation: Church leaders are sincerely convinced that you can build the kingdom of God like no generation before you, he said. We know that the Church and the kingdom of God can only continue to be established and grow if your generation is successful.
Final Refined Translation: The leaders of the church are genuinely convinced that your generation can build the kingdom of God in a way that no generation before it has, he said. We understand that the church and the kingdom of God can only continue to be built and flourish if your generation succeeds.

Source: Nur Unterkategorien Ihrer Einheit mit einem grnen Punkt knnen umbenannt werden.

Final Refined Translation: Only the subcategories of your unit that are marked with a green dot may be renamed.

Final Refined Translation: Inform FamilySearch to register as an administrator.

Final Refined Translation: In addition to your responsibility for proclaiming the gospel to non-members, you will be serving in the Belgian-Dutch Mission in Brussels.

Source: Wir sind nicht hier, um irgendjemanden dazu zu zwingen, den Willen des Vaters im Himmel zu tun. Natrlich hngt das Ma an Freiheit und Verantwortung, das wir unseren Kindern gewhren, von ihrem Alter und ihren Fhigkeiten ab. Wenn wir unseren Kindern helfen, ihre Entscheidungsfreiheit richtig auszuben, wird es leichter sein, sie zu lehren und sie liebzuhaben, ganz unabhngig von ihrem Verhalten.
First English Translation: We are not here to force anyone to do the will of Heavenly Father. Of course, the degree of freedom and responsibility we give our children depends on their age and abilities. If we help our children to exercise their agency properly, it will be easier to teach them and love them, regardless of their behavior.
Final Refined Translation: We are not here to compel anyone to fulfill the will of our Heavenly Father. Naturally, the degree of freedom and responsibility we grant our children is dependent on their age and capabilities. By assisting our children in properly exercising their freedom of choice, it will become easier to teach and love them, irrespective of their behavior.

Source: Das Buch Mormon ist ein weiterer Zeuge fr Jesus Christus und besttigt die Wahrheiten, die in der Bibel stehen.
First English Translation: The Book of Mormon is another testament of Jesus Christ and confirms the truths in the Bible.
Final Refined Translation: The Book of Mormon serves as an additional testament of Jesus Christ and affirms the truths that are presented in the Bible.

Source: Als die Heiligen der Letzten Tage aus ihren Husern in Nauvoo im Bundesstaat Illinois vertrieben wurden, fanden viele Freude inmitten des Leids.
First English Translation: When Latter-day Saints were driven from their homes in Nauvoo, Illinois, many found joy in the midst of suffering.
Final Refined Translation: When the Latter-day Saints were driven out of their homes in Nauvoo, Illinois, many discovered joy amid their suffering.

Source: Wenn man mit der Lge lebt, kann man nie vllig frei sein. Nur jemand, der stndig eine solche Last mit sich herumtrgt oder -getragen hat, kann das nachempfinden. Wir drfen nie vergessen: Etwas Falsches wird nicht dadurch richtig, dass viele es tun. Eine falsche Tat wird auch dadurch nicht richtig, weil sie fr niemanden sichtbar wird.
First English Translation: If you live with the lie, you can never be completely free. Only someone who constantly carries or has carried such a burden around with him can relate to it. We must never forget: Something wrong does not become right because many do it. A wrong deed also does not become right because it is not visible to anyone.
Final Refined Translation: Living with a lie means that one can never be entirely free. Only someone who continuously carries, or has carried, such a burden can truly empathize with this. We must always remember: Something that is wrong does not become right merely because many people partake in it. An immoral act does not become justified just because it is concealed from others.

Source: Im Mrz 1944, der Krieg war inzwischen auf seinem Hhepunkt, wurde das Schiff vor Saipan im Sdpazifik angegriffen. Arthur war einer derjenigen an Bord, die auf See verschollen blieben. Der blaue Stern wurde von seinem Ehrenplatz am vorderen Fenster des Hauses der Familie Patton entfernt. An seine Stelle kam ein goldener Stern, der anzeigte, dass derjenige, fr den der blaue Stern gestanden hatte, im Kampf gefallen war. Ein Licht erlosch im Leben von Mrs. Patton.
First English Translation: In March 1944, the war was now at its peak, the ship was attacked off Saipan in the South Pacific. Arthur was one of those on board who remained missing at sea. The blue star has been removed from its place of honor on the front window of the Patton family home. In its place came a gold star, which indicated that the one for whom the blue star had stood had fallen in battle. A light went out in Mrs. Patton's life.
Final Refined Translation: In March 1944, as the war reached its peak, the ship was attacked off the coast of Saipan in the South Pacific. Arthur was among those on board who went missing at sea. The blue star was taken down from its honored place at the front window of the Patton family home. In its stead, a gold star was hung, signifying that the individual for whom the blue star had represented had fallen in battle. A light had gone out in Mrs. Patton's life.

Source: Und ich erblickte auch einen engen und schmalen Pfad, der an der eisernen Stange entlangfhrte, ja, zu dem Baum, bei dem ich stand;
First English Translation: And I also saw a narrow and narrow path that led along the iron bar, yes, to the tree by which I stood;
Final Refined Translation: I also noticed a narrow and winding path that ran along the iron post, reaching the tree where I stood.

Source: Freiwillige helfen auf eigene Gefahr. Jugendliche unter 18 drfen nur teilnehmen, wenn sie von einem Elternteil begleitet werden, oder eine Erlaubnis seitens der Erziehungsberechtigten vorliegt.
First English Translation: Volunteers help at their own risk. Young people under the age of 18 are only allowed to participate if they are accompanied by a parent or have permission from their legal guardians.
Final Refined Translation: Volunteers take part at their own risk. Individuals under 18 are only allowed to participate if they are accompanied by a parent or if they have obtained permission from their legal guardians.

Source: Die scheinbar bersprungenen Leerfelder sind die Felder, die in dem von Ancestry.com generierten Index nicht bercksichtigt wurden. Die Stze mit solchen bersprungenen Feldern enthalten den letzten Index, der ber Ancestry.com erstellt wurde. Darin kommen die neuen Felder, die jetzt indexiert werden mssen, noch nicht vor. Das Projekt ist dadurch wesentlich aufwndiger geworden, sodass mehr Indexierungsarbeit als bei den vorigen US-Volkszhlungsprojekten, an denen sich FamilySearch beteiligt hat, erforderlich ist.
First English Translation: The blank spaces that appear to be skipped are the fields that were not included in the index generated by Ancestry.com. The records with such skipped fields contain the last index created via Ancestry.com. The new fields that now have to be indexed do not yet appear in it. This has made the project much more cumbersome, requiring more indexing work than previous U.S. census projects in which FamilySearch participated.
Final Refined Translation: The seemingly omitted blank fields are those that were not considered in the index generated by Ancestry.com. The records featuring these omitted fields represent the latest index created through Ancestry.com, which does not yet include the new fields that now require indexing. As a result, the project has become significantly more labor-intensive, necessitating more indexing efforts than in previous U.S. census projects that FamilySearch was part of.

Final Refined Translation: East North Temple Street

Source: Entscheidet sich der Schler dafr, mitzuarbeiten, bt er seine Entscheidungsfreiheit aus, und zwar so, dass der Heilige Geist ihm eine Botschaft bermitteln kann, die auf seine individuellen Bedrfnisse zugeschnitten ist. Wenn die Schler zur Mitarbeit angeregt werden, ist es sehr viel wahrscheinlicher, dass der Heilige Geist noch etwas sehr viel Wichtigeres lehrt als das, was Sie vermitteln knnen.
First English Translation: When the student chooses to participate, he or she exercises his agency in such a way that the Holy Ghost can convey a message tailored to his or her individual needs. If students are encouraged to participate, it is much more likely that the Holy Ghost will teach something far more important than what you can teach.
Final Refined Translation: When a student decides to participate, they are exercising their freedom of choice in a manner that enables the Holy Spirit to convey a message specifically tailored to their individual needs. When students are encouraged to engage, it becomes far more likely that the Holy Spirit will impart lessons that are significantly more important than what you are capable of teaching.

Source: Glaube als Strkung der Ehe
First English Translation: Faith as a strengthening of marriage
Final Refined Translation: Faith as a means to strengthen the marriage

Source: Man kann kommerziell abgeflltes Wasser in PET-Behltern kaufen. Nehmen Sie das Mindesthaltbarkeitsdatum der Behlter als Richtwert fr den Verbrauch. Verwenden Sie keine Kunststoffbehlter, die nicht aus PET hergestellt wurden.
First English Translation: You can buy commercially bottled water in PET containers. Use the best-before date of the containers as a guideline for consumption. Do not use plastic containers that are not made of PET.
Final Refined Translation: You can buy commercially bottled water in PET containers. Use the expiration date printed on the containers as a guideline for consumption. Avoid using plastic containers that are not made from PET.

Source: Denken Sie daran, dass die Namen, die so schwer zu finden sind, wirkliche Menschen sind, denen Sie Ihr Dasein in dieser Welt verdanken und denen Sie in der Geisterwelt wieder begegnen werden.
First English Translation: Remember that the names that are so hard to find are real people to whom you owe your existence in this world and whom you will meet again in the spirit world.
Final Refined Translation: Remember that the names you find so difficult to uncover are those of real people to whom you owe your existence in this world, and with whom you will encounter again in the spirit realm.

Source: Wahrscheinlich kennen die Schler bereits den Bericht, wie Enos den ganzen Tag und die ganze Nacht lang betet. Sie knnen ihnen helfen, diese Begebenheit noch besser zu verstehen. Wenn die Schler den Bericht lesen und darber sprechen, knnen sie erkennen, auf welche Weise und mit welcher Einstellung sie ihren Gebeten noch mehr Bedeutung geben knnen. Sie verstehen auch besser, wie sich die Segnungen des Shnopfers auf ihr Leben auswirken.
First English Translation: Probably the students already know the account of how Enos prays all day and all night long. You can help them understand this story even better. As students read and share the account, they can see how and with what attitude they can give more meaning to their prayers. They also have a better understanding of how the blessings of the sacrifice affect their lives.
Final Refined Translation: It is likely that the students are already acquainted with the account of how Enos prays both day and night. You can assist them in gaining an even deeper understanding of this experience. As they read and discuss the account, they can recognize how and with what attitude they can ascribe greater significance to their prayers. They will also gain a clearer insight into how the blessings from the atonement impact their lives.

Source: Bei einer Podiumsdiskussion, die er leitete, wies Elder M. Russell Ballard vom Kollegium der Zwlf Apostel darauf hin, dass es sinnvoll sei und man viel lernen knne, wenn man die Anweisungen in den Gemeinderatssitzungen Kapitel fr Kapitel liest und die Grundstze bespricht.
First English Translation: In a panel discussion he chaired, Elder M. Russell Ballard of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles pointed out that there is value and much to learn by reading the instructions in ward council meetings chapter by chapter and discussing the principles.
Final Refined Translation: During a panel discussion he led, Elder M. Russell Ballard of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles emphasized the value and the wealth of knowledge to be gained from reading the instructions for ward council meetings chapter by chapter and engaging in discussions about the principles.

Source: Elder Oaks zitiert Gordon B. Hinckley 1910-2008, den 15. Prsidenten der Kirche: Wir knnen hflich anderer Meinung sein, ohne unangenehm zu werden.
First English Translation: Elder Oaks quotes Gordon B. Hinckley 1910–2008, the 15th President of the Church: We can disagree without becoming uncomfortable.
Final Refined Translation: Elder Oaks cites Gordon B. Hinckley (1910–2008), the 15th President of the Church: We can politely disagree without becoming uncomfortable.

Source: Die erwachsenen Jugendfhrer im Pfahl Hongkong forderten das Jugendkomitee auf, selbst ein Dienstprojekt auszusuchen. Nachdem sich die Jugendlichen erkundigt hatten, was vor Ort dringend gebraucht wurde, beschlossen sie, an einer Schule Kurse fr Kinder aus einkommensschwachen Familien durchzufhren. Etwa 125 Jugendliche erklrten mehr als 80 Schulkindern, wie man seine Talente entwickelt, gesundes Essen kocht, in der Familie Zeit freinander findet und gute Freundschaften aufbaut.
First English Translation: Adult youth leaders in the Hong Kong Stake invited the Youth Committee to choose its own service project. After the young people had inquired about what was urgently needed locally, they decided to conduct courses for children from low-income families at a school. About 125 young people explained to more than 80 schoolchildren how to develop their talents, cook healthy food, find time for each other in the family and build good friendships.
Final Refined Translation: The adult youth leaders in the Hong Kong Stake encouraged the Youth Committee to select their own service project. After the youth inquired about the most urgent needs in the community, they decided to conduct classes for children from low-income families at a nearby school. Approximately 125 young people taught over 80 schoolchildren how to develop their talents, prepare healthy meals, engage in quality family time, and foster meaningful friendships.

Source: Eineinhalb Jahrhunderte lang hat das Massaker von Mountain Meadows diejenigen schockiert und bedrckt, die davon erfahren haben. Die Tragdie hat den Angehrigen der Opfer tiefes Leid zugefgt und den Nachkommen der Tter sowie Mitgliedern der Kirche generell das schmerzhafte Gefhl kollektiver Schuld aufgebrdet. Sie hat Kritik an der Kirche ausgelst und schmerzliche und schwierige Fragen aufgeworfen. Wie konnte das geschehen? Wie konnten Mitglieder der Kirche sich an einem solchen Verbrechen beteiligen?
First English Translation: For a century and a half, the Mountain Meadows massacre shocked and oppressed those who learned about it. The tragedy inflicted deep suffering on the families of the victims and inflicted a painful sense of collective guilt on the descendants of the Fathers and members of the Church in general. It has sparked criticism of the Church and raised painful and difficult questions. How could this happen? How could members of the Church participate in such a crime?
Final Refined Translation: For one and a half centuries, the Mountain Meadows massacre has shocked and troubled those who learned about it. The tragedy has caused profound suffering for the victims' families, while also imposing a painful sense of collective guilt on the descendants of the perpetrators and the Church's members as a whole. It has triggered criticism of the Church and raised challenging and painful questions: How could this happen? How could Church members participate in such a crime?

Source: Wir beauftragen Sie, in der Korea-Mission Seoul zu arbeiten.

Final Refined Translation: We assign you to work in the Korea Mission in Seoul.

Source: Ein Mann, der schon ber 80 war ein Mitglied der Kirche, das sein Geld mit Fahrradreparaturen verdiente und die Fahrrder der Missionare immer kostenlos reparierte , fuhr eines Abends bei strmendem Regen zur Wohnung der Missionare, um zu fragen, ob die Missionare mitkommen und seiner Frau einen Krankensegen geben wrden.
First English Translation: A man who was in his 80s, a member of the Church who made his money repairing bicycles and always repaired the missionaries' bicycles for free, drove to the missionaries' home one evening in the pouring rain to ask if the missionaries would come along and give his wife a blessing to the sick.
Final Refined Translation: An elderly man, over 80 years old and a member of the Church, earned his living by repairing bicycles and consistently repaired the missionaries' bicycles free of charge. One evening, amidst a heavy downpour, he traveled to the missionaries' residence to ask if they would accompany him to provide a blessing for his sick wife.

Source: Meine Augen haben den Erlser gesehen,

Final Refined Translation: My eyes have beheld the Redeemer.

Source: Wir sollen den Menschen vergeben, die uns verletzen oder beleidigen. Wenn wir ihnen vergeben, wird der himmlische Vater uns vergeben.
First English Translation: We are to forgive the people who hurt or insult us. If we forgive them, Heavenly Father will forgive us.
Final Refined Translation: We are called to forgive those who hurt or insult us. When we extend forgiveness to them, our Heavenly Father will also grant us forgiveness.

First English Translation: Nothing in this world is as personal, as uplifting or as life-changing as the influence of a righteous woman.
Final Refined Translation: In this world, nothing is as personal, empowering, or life-changing as the influence of a virtuous woman.

Source: Die Liebe zu Gott und der aufrichtige Wunsch, seine Gebote zu halten, bewegen uns zur Umkehr.
First English Translation: Love for God and a sincere desire to keep His commandments move us to repentance.
Final Refined Translation: Our love for God and our genuine desire to uphold His commandments inspire us to repent.

First English Translation: The program has not been used for minutes. Do you want to stay logged in?
Final Refined Translation: The program has not been used for a few minutes. Would you like to remain logged in?

Source: Wenn man sich bekehrt hat, freut man sich auf den Sonntag, weil es der Sabbat ist. Am Sonntag denkt man nicht: O nein, heute kann ich nicht mit meinen Freunden abhngen oder ins Kino gehen, sondern man denkt: Ich freue mich, dass ich in die Kirche gehen und mich mit Geistigem befassen kann und dass ich Zeit mit meiner Familie verbringen kann.
First English Translation: When you are converted, you look forward to Sunday because it is the Sabbath. On Sunday, you don't think: Oh no, today I can't hang out with my friends or go to the movies, but you think: I'm happy that I can go to church and deal with spiritual things and that I can spend time with my family.
Final Refined Translation: Once you have converted, you look forward to Sunday because it is the Sabbath. On Sundays, you do not think, 'Oh no, today I can’t hang out with my friends or go to the movies.' Instead, you think, 'I am excited to go to church, to engage in spiritual matters, and to spend quality time with my family.'

Source: Junge Erwachsene auf der ganzen Welt gehorchen diesem Aufruf zum Dienen, aber es erfordert Glauben und Mut, dem Propheten zu folgen.
First English Translation: Young adults around the world obey this call to service, but it takes faith and courage to follow the prophet.
Final Refined Translation: Young adults across the globe respond to this call to serve, yet it demands faith and courage to follow the prophet.

Source: Es kam oft vor, dass ich zu ein, zwei Anzgen, die ein Kunde ausgesucht hatte, eine Auswahl von Hemden und Krawatten zusammenstellte, die ich fr passend hielt. Doch nachdem ich die Hemden und Krawatten vom einen in den anderen Bereich gebracht und neben die Anzge gelegt hatte, war das Ergebnis berraschend: Die Farben nderten sich in dem neuen Licht und passten nun gar nicht zusammen.
First English Translation: It often happened that for one or two suits that a customer had chosen, I put together a selection of shirts and ties that I thought would fit. But after I had moved the shirts and ties from one area to the other and placed them next to the suits, the result was surprising: The colors changed in the new light and now did not match at all.
Final Refined Translation: It was common for me to assemble a selection of shirts and ties that I felt were appropriate for one or two suits that a client had chosen. However, once I relocated the shirts and ties to another section and placed them next to the suits, the outcome was surprising: the colors appeared different in the new lighting and no longer coordinated at all.

Final Refined Translation: Special Invitation to the CES Fireside Broadcast for Young Adults in May 2009

Source: Betont, wie wichtig wohlwollendes Verhalten ist.

Final Refined Translation: Stresses the significance of kind and supportive behavior.

Source: Prsident Joseph Fielding Smith hat gesagt: Man kann zwar behaupten, dass wir nur eine Handvoll sind im Vergleich zur Weltbevlkerung, man kann uns aber auch mit dem Sauerteig vergleichen, der letztlich die ganze Welt durchdringen sollte und von dem der Heiland gesprochen hatte. Wir knnen und werden zu gegebener Zeit gewiss Einfluss auf die ganze Menschheit nehmen. Man wird wissen, wer wir sind und warum es uns gibt. Es mag hoffnungslos erscheinen, es ist eine monumentale Aufgabe, aber es ist nicht nur mglich, sondern auch gewiss, dass wir den Kampf gegen den Satan gewinnen werden.
First English Translation: President Joseph Fielding Smith said: While it can be said that we are only a handful compared to the world, we can also be compared to the leaven that would eventually permeate the whole world and of which the Savior had spoken. We can and will certainly influence all of humanity in due course. People will know who we are and why we exist. It may seem hopeless, it is a monumental task, but it is not only possible, but also certain, that we will win the battle against Satan.
Final Refined Translation: President Joseph Fielding Smith stated: Although it can be claimed that we are merely a handful compared to the world population, we can also be likened to leaven that is destined to eventually permeate the entire world, as the Savior mentioned. In due time, we can and will undoubtedly have an influence on all of humanity. People will come to know who we are and why we exist. It may seem hopeless and it is indeed a monumental task, yet it is not only possible but also certain that we will emerge victorious in our battle against Satan.

Source: Vom 11. bis 26. November 2011 finden die Tage der offenen Tr statt auer sonntags.
First English Translation: From 11 to 26 November 2011 the Open Days will take place except on Sundays.
Final Refined Translation: From November 11 to 26, 2011, the Open Days will be held, except on Sundays.

Source: Auch Alessia war berzeugt, dass ihre Beziehung zu einem jungen Mann genau das war, was sie sein sollte. Unsere Geschichte war so wunderschn, dass wir meinten, unsere Beziehung wrde nie enden, auch wenn wir die blichen Schwierigkeiten hatten, die jedes Paar erlebt, erzhlt sie.
First English Translation: Alessia was also convinced that her relationship with a young man was exactly what it should be. Our story was so beautiful that we thought our relationship would never end, even though we had the usual difficulties that every couple experiences, she says.
Final Refined Translation: Alessia was also convinced that her relationship with a young man was exactly what it was meant to be. Our story was so beautiful that we believed our relationship would never come to an end, despite facing the typical challenges that every couple experiences, she shares.

Source: Brder und Schwestern, ist Ihnen klar, was wir haben? Erkennen Sie, welche Stelle wir in diesem groen Drama der Menschheitsgeschichte einnehmen?
First English Translation: Brothers and sisters, do you realize what we have? Do you see what place we occupy in this great drama of human history?
Final Refined Translation: Brothers and sisters, do you understand what we possess? Are you aware of the role we assume in this grand drama of human history?

Source: Was haben die Propheten und Apostel darber gesagt?
First English Translation: What did the prophets and apostles say about this?
Final Refined Translation: What did the prophets and apostles say about it?

Source: Sie knnen die heiligen Handlungen des Tempels vollziehen lassen, wenn jemand seit zehn Jahren als tot gilt. Diese Regel gilt zum einen fr im Krieg vermisste, auf See verschollene oder fr tot erklrte Personen sowie zum anderen fr Personen, die unter Umstnden verschwunden sind, bei denen der Tod offensichtlich ist, jedoch keine Leiche gefunden wurde.
First English Translation: You can perform temple ordinances if someone has been dead for ten years. This rule applies on the one hand to persons missing in war, missing at sea or declared dead and, on the other hand, to persons who have disappeared under circumstances where death is evident but no body has been found.
Final Refined Translation: Temple ordinances may be performed for individuals who have been considered dead for ten years. This rule applies, firstly, to those who are missing in action during wartime, those lost at sea, or those who have been officially declared deceased; and secondly, to individuals who have vanished under circumstances indicating that death is likely, although their remains have not been found.

Source: Bitten Sie die Schler, in diesen Versen Wrter oder Ausdrcke zu finden, die aussagen, was das geistige Fortkommen der Menschen behindert hat. Schreiben Sie die Antworten an die Tafel. Veranschaulichen Sie ihnen, dass diese Menschen zwar einmal geglaubt hatten, dass ihre schlechten Handlungen aber dazu fhrten, dass sie ihr Zeugnis vergaen und zur Schlechtigkeit zurckkehrten.
First English Translation: Invite students to find words or phrases in these verses that teach what has hindered people's spiritual advancement. Write the answers on the board. Illustrate to them that although these people had once believed, their bad actions caused them to forget their testimonies and return to wickedness.
Final Refined Translation: Ask the students to identify words or phrases in these verses that indicate what has hindered the spiritual advancement of humanity. Write their responses on the board. Illustrate to them that these individuals, although they once believed, allowed their wrongdoings to cause them to forget their testimonies and revert to a state of wickedness.

Source: Folglich hilft uns der im Shnopfer enthaltene Aspekt, dass wir befhigt werden und Kraft bekommen, auf eine Weise zu sehen, zu handeln und gut zu werden, die wir mit unseren begrenzten irdischen Fhigkeiten nie erfassen oder erreichen knnten. Ich bezeuge, dass im Shnopfer des Erlsers wirklich eine Macht steckt, die uns Fhigkeiten verleiht. Ohne diese Macht aus dem Shnopfer, die mir Kraft gibt, knnte ich heute Morgen nicht vor Ihnen stehen.
First English Translation: Consequently, the aspect of the sacrifice helps us to become empowered and empowered to see, act, and become good in ways that we could never grasp or achieve with our limited earthly abilities. I testify that there is really a power in the Savior's sacrifice that gives us abilities. Without this power from the sacrifice that gives me strength, I would not be able to stand before you this morning.
Final Refined Translation: Consequently, the aspect of the Atonement empowers us and grants us strength to see, act, and improve in ways we could never comprehend or achieve with our limited earthly abilities. I testify that there is indeed a power in the Atonement provided by the Savior, which bestows upon us capabilities. Without this power from the Atonement that gives me strength, I would not be able to stand before you this morning.

Source: Whrend meiner Kindheit und frhen Jugend wurde ich hin- und hergereicht. Ich erlebte nie, wie es war, eine Familie zu haben, und bekam auch niemals ein Geschenk, nicht einmal zum Geburtstag oder zu Weihnachten.
First English Translation: During my childhood and early youth I was passed back and forth. I never experienced what it was like to have a family and never got a gift, not even for my birthday or Christmas.
Final Refined Translation: Throughout my childhood and early youth, I was shuffled between different homes. I never knew what it felt like to have a family, nor did I ever receive a gift—not even for my birthday or Christmas.

Source: Asenaca hat, obwohl sie erst 19 ist, in ihrem Leben schon viel Kummer erlebt. Dennoch strahlt sie Freude aus. Sie freut sich an der Gewissheit, dass sie zu einer ewigen Familie gehrt, denn ihre Familie wurde 2001 im Suva-Tempel gesiegelt, und sie freut sich an der Gewissheit, dass der himmlische Vater sie kennt und liebt.
First English Translation: Asenaca, although she is only 19, has already experienced a lot of grief in her life. Nevertheless, she radiates joy. She rejoices in the assurance that she belongs to an eternal family, for her family was sealed in the Suva Temple in 2001, and she rejoices in the assurance that Heavenly Father knows and loves her.
Final Refined Translation: Although she is only 19 years old, Asenaca has already encountered a significant amount of sorrow in her life. Still, she radiates joy. She derives comfort from the knowledge that she belongs to an eternal family, as her family was sealed in the Suva Temple in 2001. Additionally, she finds assurance in the certainty that Heavenly Father knows and loves her.

Source: Wir weisen warnend darauf hin, dass jemand, der die Bndnisse der Keuschheit verletzt, der seinen Ehepartner oder seine Nachkommen misshandelt oder missbraucht oder seinen familiren Verpflichtungen nicht nachkommt, eines Tages vor Gott Rechenschaft ablegen muss. Weiter warnen wir davor, dass der Zerfall der Familie ber die Menschen, Lnder und Vlker das Unheil bringen wird, das in alter und neuer Zeit von den Propheten vorhergesagt worden ist.
First English Translation: We warn that those who violate the covenants of chastity, mistreat or abuse their spouse or offspring, or fail to fulfill their family responsibilities will one day be accountable to God. Further, we warn that the disintegration of the family will bring upon people, countries and peoples the calamity foretold by the prophets in ancient and modern times.
Final Refined Translation: We issue a solemn warning that anyone who violates the covenants of chastity, mistreats or abuses their spouse or children, or neglects their familial obligations will one day be held accountable before God. Furthermore, we caution that the breakdown of the family will bring calamity upon individuals, nations, and peoples, as has been foretold by the prophets of both ancient and modern times.

Source: Der Herr mchte, dass ihr, meine jungen Freunde, von ganzem Herzen bestrebt seid, nach diesen Mastben und nach der Wahrheit in den heiligen Schriften zu leben. Wenn ihr dies tut, werdet ihr ber den Augenblick hinausschauen, und ihr werdet eine strahlend schne Zukunft vor euch sehen, die groe Chancen und Aufgaben fr euch bereithlt. Ihr werdet bereit seid, euch anzustrengen und lange durchzuhalten, und ihr werdet eine optimistische Lebensauffassung haben.
First English Translation: The Lord wants you, my young friends, to strive with all your heart to live according to these standards and the truth in the scriptures. When you do so you will look beyond the moment, and you will see a bright future that holds great opportunities and tasks for you. You will be willing to make an effort and hold out for a long time, and you will have an optimistic outlook on life.
Final Refined Translation: The Lord wishes for you, my young friends, to wholeheartedly strive to live by these principles and the truths found in the holy scriptures. If you do this, you will see beyond the present moment and envision a bright future before you, filled with significant opportunities and challenges. You will be prepared to put in the effort and persevere for an extended period, holding onto an optimistic perspective on life.

It made me much more aware of the comfort that the Holy Ghost and the teaching that families are eternal, and that the sacrifice of Jesus Christ has a real effect on our lives, she says.

This experience made me much more aware of the comfort provided by the Holy Spirit and the teaching that families can be eternal, as well as the true impact of the Atonement of Jesus Christ on our lives.
